name: And then you'll find it
description:
“And then you’ll find it” is a performance for you. Slightly unexpected in format and context, a little bit poetic in content, and hugely sincere in purpose. Download and enjoy as is or grab it as NFT, as your personal artwork in the intergalactic blockchain universe. 
Reaching here means you have had an impact on our existence and we appreciate it. We hope to be a good companion and deliver quality content as we strive forth in search of establishing a true and long lasting connection through whatever channels our creativity might find. 
Thank you!
